Comment 3: 
You can see that the 16 window adjustment messages are coming through after we've
finished writing. Hence, we're no longer looping in chanWriter.Write(), which means
we're no longer consuming these messages.

I don't know what the expected behaviour is in this case. We could ignore window
adjustment messages received after we sendEOF to the server, but I don't know the spec
well enough to know if this makes sense.
